physical_appearance: This gelatin silver print is a pictorial of two half dressed young boys. The camera focuses on them whilst the background blends out of focus. The taller boy has his arms around the shorter boy, who holds a rattan basket in his hands. It is evident that the photograph is discoloured.
sgcool_label_text: Ho Koon Sang was a member of the Photographic Society of Singapore and an Associate of the Royal Photographic Society in London. This photograph was part of a set of 12 prints sent to the Royal Photographic Society in 1956.
subject_terms_1: portraits rural life rural areas rural communities
